moduleDescription:
All functionality for accessing and manipulating filesystems,
including reading and writing of files and directories, enumerating
directory contents and removing files and directories.

entities.name: File
entities.description: The File class is used to access and manipulate the filesystem of the current environment. Despite the name of the class, this class is used to manipulate all kinds of filesystem entries, including files, directories, symbolic links, block devices, etc., depending on the underlying platform.
